p: Mainstreaming climate change adaptation into WaSH development planning in the Bolgatanga Municipality offers a path forward, both to strategically respond to the climate change threat and to deliver the sustainable WaSH services required by the communities in this region. Mainstreaming is particularly powerful in that it can lever political will and resources across multiple sectors [ 17], which will not only have multiple benefits for the people of Ghana, but will also reduce the likelihood of management decisions being maladaptive and causing unintended consequences for the people in urban and rural communities.
